a.style: text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; margin-bottom: 10px; position: relative; overflow: hidden; transform: scale(0.90);

img.style: width: 140px; height: 140px; position: relative; z-index: 1; border: 2px solid #FFAB91; border-radius: 8px; transition: opacity 0.3s;

span.style: position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #FFAB91; opacity: 0; z-index: 0;
